name: Besame - Kissing Couple surrounded by white velvet roses - OFF BEAT BRIDE
description:
Super great image from Jose Guadalupe Posada ... the padrino of Dia De Los Muertos. La despedida del revolucionario ... the revolutionary's farewell surrounded by white velvet roses. 8" glass 7 day candle with cotton wick.

This special edition candle is perfect for that wedding day centerpiece! Or better yet let your guest take this home as a favor. You and your special someones name or the date of your wedding can be added to your candles! Please convo me for pricing on custom orders!

!Art Is Dead!

If you are in the Bay Area please come by Amor Eterno Tattoo and Art Space in Oakland ...
Amor Eterno Tattoo and Art Space
1227 18th Ave Oakland CA
510.842.3620
facebook.com/amoreternotattoo

*** I will refund shipping cost if it turns out to be cheaper. The candles require packing materials to ensure a safe trip. ***

name: Mexican inspired nicho. El Corazon. OOAK Dia De Los Muertos
description:
This medium sized nicho features El Corazon (the heart) loteria card. Framing El Corazon is brightly colored oilcloth and red fabric. Hand embellished red sequins line the frame with bright yellow pom pom trim and vivid blue lace! A delicate red velvet rose completes this nicho. Each nicho is one of a kind.
Size: 8"x6"

This medium nicho is perfect for your desk or home. Can be hung or simply propped up. Is ready to hang with self leveling hardware. Also wonderful addition to your Dia De Los Muertos altar.

Nicos can be customized with your choice of centerpiece or colors. Make amazing wedding favors or a gift for someone special. Wholesale is available. Please do not hesitate to contact me with questions or ideas! Muchas gracias! Arte es la vida!

If you are in the Northern California area please come by and visit:
Amor Eterno Tattoo and Art Space
1227 18th Ave
Oakland Califas
facebook.com/amoreternotattoo
arte cultura y tattoos!

name: Black Cross Milagro Nicho with vintage gold foil applique
description:
Inspired by barro negro pottery of Oaxaca. Handmade clay black cross milagro as its centerpiece. This small nicho features black sequins and bright pom pom trim. The vintage gold foil applique pops against red fabric. Each nicho is one of a kind. (2.5"x4")

This mini nicho is perfect for your carrucha, desk or home. Can be hung or simply propped up. Is ready to hang with self leveling hardware. Also wonderful addition to your Dia De Los Muertos altar.

Nicos can be customized with your choice of centerpiece or colors. Make amazing wedding favors or a gift for someone special. Wholesale is available. Please do not hesitate to contact me with questions or ideas! Muchas gracias! Arte es la vida!

name: La Sirena Nicho! Diosa del mar! OOAK
description:
This is truly a one-of-a-kind folk art nicho. Inspired by La Sirena, the mermaid. It features a hand painted mermaid milagro from Mexico with a burst of vintage gold foil for her halo. She is framed with hand embellished found seashells and vivid blue lace. Diosa del mar! Goddess of the sea!
Size: 8"x6"

This medium nicho is perfect for your desk or home. Can be hung or simply propped up. Is ready to hang with self leveling hardware. Also wonderful addition to your Dia De Los Muertos altar.

name: El Diablito Nicho! The Devil Nicho! ART IS DEAD!
description:
This small nicho features a mini El Diablito (the devil) loteria card framed by vintage gold foil. The edges are adorned with gold sequins and bright yellow pom pom trim. Each nicho is one of a kind.
Size: 5"x3"

This small nicho is perfect for your car, desk or home. Can be hung or simply propped up. Is ready to hang with self leveling hardware. Also wonderful addition to your Dia De Los Muertos altar.
